import {IoMdSunny, IoMdRainy, IoMdCloudy, IoMdSnow,IoMdThunderstorm, IoMdSearch} from 'react-icons/io'; import {BsArrowUp, BsArrowDown, BsThermometer, BsWind, BsWater} from 'react-icons/bs'; function CurrentWeather({ weather: { name, temp_low, temp_max, speed, humidity, feels_like } }){ return ( <>

{name}

Tuesday | 9 May 2023 | Local time: 12:00am

25 째C

High: {temp_max}째C

Low: {temp_low}째C

Feels like {feels_like}째C

Wind {speed}m/s

Humidity: {humidity}%

) } export default CurrentWeather;
